arts.ttl: Seaone and Kleindienst react to Stuttgart win
arts.sum: Speaking after Borussia Mönchengladbach's impressive away win against VfB Stuttgart, head coach Gerardo Seaone and match-winner Tim Kleindienst gave their thoughts.

arts.ttl: Hoeneß says Stuttgart "must improve" after Gladbach loss
arts.sum: After his side fell to a 2-1 defeat against Borussia Mönchengladbach, Sebastian Hoeneß gave his thoughts, alongside goalkeeper Alexander Nübel, and midfield talisman Angelo Stiller

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach win 2-1 away at VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach clinch a 2-1 away victory at VfB Stuttgart thanks to a crucial late goal from Tim Kleindienst to take them up to seventh in the league standings. The physical nature of Gladbach's off-ball approach was evident, with Kevin Stöger receiving a yellow card in the 42nd minute for a foul on Leweling.

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: Die Schwaben in need of reaction
arts.sum: Stuttgart require a strong reaction after suffering heartbreak in the Champions League on Wednesday evening, losing 4-1 against Paris Saint Germain. They face a Borussia Mönchengladbach side coming off the back of a 3-0 win against Bochum last time out.
VfB Stuttgart have reportedly turned down an offer for Anthony Rouault from French side Stade Rennes.

arts.ttl: Rennes have bid rejected by VfB Stuttgart for Anthony Rouault
arts.sum: Sky Germany reports that Rennes have had a bid rejected by VfB Stuttgart over a permanent deal for defender Anthony Rouault. The 23-year-old has a contract at the MHP Arena until…

arts.ttl: Preview: Stuttgart vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Stuttgart and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
